# Task

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example



# Data

wrap_string("This function will wrap words into lines")

```julia
function wrap_string(s, text_width::Int=10)
    words = split(s, ' ')
    result = ""
    line = ""
    for word in words
        if length(line * " $word ") > text_width 
            result *= "$line\n"
            line = ""
        end
        line *= " $word "
    end
    result * "$line"
end
```

# Test

wrap_string("This function will wrap words into lines", 10)

The output of this code would be:

```julia
"This function\nwill wrap words\ninto lines"
```
